title: (PSX-PSP) Diablo converted properly by KloWn
description:
Play as a strong warrior, magical sorcerer, or the balanced rogue as you travel through 16 randomly generated levels of action in an effort to defeat the Lord of Hell, Diablo. Battle skeletons, zombies, and demons with magic, swords, clubs, and arrows. Occasionally, villagers will ask you to perform additional quests to help make the town a safer place. If all of the enemies overwhelm you, get a friend to help you out with the multiplayer mode. Several new special effects have been added to the PlayStation version to give the game an added graphical punch. Also included is a new double-speed mode that will allow you to get out sticky situations twice as fast. Diablo brings old-fashioned dungeon exploration home.


I have also included the latest popsplugin and ALL sony prx which are required to play psx-psp conversions on custom firmware&#039;s... To install the pops simply copy the seplugins folder to the root of your memory stick, turn off your psp, hold down the right trigger button while turning the psp back on to go into recovery mode..Select the plugins option and enable the pops...Everytime you start a new psx game it will ask you which pops you wish to use I recommend using 3.40 pops as I have personally have had no problems with ANY psx game so far.....Drag and drop the folder of the game you wish to play to the PSP-->GAME folder on your memory stick and away you go..ENJOY and don&#039;t forget to say thanx.....
